page.description: Removes blank lines from the string.

argument.name: Source
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited character string list containing 0 or more lines with NULL content.

page.discussion: REMOVE_BLANK_LINES() removes all lines in a CR-LF delimited list that have NULL ("") content. Lines that contain invisible characters, such as spaces (" ") will not be removed.
page.example: dim cs as C cs = "abc" + crlf() + "" + crlf() + "def" + crlf() ? cs = abc def CS = remove_blank_lines(cs) ? cs abc def
